attributes.action: To Let all pregnancies have a choice  to have  Genetic Testing
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I'm a Parent to a child that was born with a terminal illness, given no chance of survial and basically left to passaway, I Had all the tests given but still her genetic condition was not detected, I was told if i was over 30 i would have been told about a test that detects genetic abnormailities but is not available on the nhs. The test Cost is £300 . Surely all woman At any age should be offered this test. Surely it would help alot of parents that have to deal with heart ache at birth if they No prior to birth.
